content: <articles>    <article xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink/">   <front>     <article-meta>       <title-group>         <article-title>Emotion and Metacontrol</article-title>       </title-group>       <contrib-group>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Hern\ufffd\ufffdndez</surname>             <given-names>Carlos</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>UPM Autonomous Systems Laboratory</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>G\ufffd\ufffdmez</surname>             <given-names>Jaime</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>UPM Autonomous Systems Laboratory</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>S\ufffd\ufffdnches</surname>             <given-names>Guadalupe</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>UPM Autonomous Systems Laboratory</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Sanz</surname>             <given-names>Ricardo</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>UPM Autonomous Systems Laboratory</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>       </contrib-group>       <pub-date pub-type="pub">         <year>2010</year>       </pub-date>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/7021"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/7021/files/EmotionandMetacontrol.pdf"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/7021/files/EmotionandMetacontrol.png?subformat=icon-90"/>     </article-meta>     <abstract>In the ICEA Project we are concerned with the extraction of general designs from rat brains. We are interested in designs that capture the core integrational aspects of emotion and cognition.</abstract>   </front>   <article-type>poster</article-type> </article>   </articles>
